attributes.action: say YES to McDonald's on Kenton lane
attributes.additional_details: There is a plan to build a multi-story McDonald's restaurant on the old crofters lodge site on Kenton lane, not everybody has to use it, but for those of us who would like a nearby McDonald's then this would be a great idea. As of 13/06/14 the page for NO TO MCDONALD'S currently has 8 signatures, lets get more!!!
